column5: Still not enough. I'm sure suspending hunting privileges in Ontario for life is going to stop these poachers from hunting ever again. https://mnrwatch.com/illegal-hunts-result-in-lifetime-hunting-licence-suspensions-and-almost-60000-in-fines/
honestly...when you go to that extent, how is there no jail time? Fraud, falsifying documents, hiding and destroying evidence...all for significant monetary gain. Thats gotta be jail time.
Michigan received convictions: Onie Miller III, Onie Miller IV, Makes you wonder about the future of Onie Miller V
This needs to happen more often..
I think the fines are too minimal. On average $6,000 each. May slow them down but they may continue in the future when they figure the ministry isn't watching them any longer.
